definition.name: shim-auth-server
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLEDIRBASE.idmresource.NOVLEDIRBASEConnectionPrompts.gcv.dscr.shim-auth-server)Enter the DNS host name or IP address, and communication port of the Identity Manager server in the remote tree. For example: 192.168.12.47:8196 or hostname:8196
